snippet.title: Cryptmaster | Console Launch Date Announcement
snippet.description:
Cryptmaster is coming to Xbox and Playstation on October 3rd!
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/cryptmaster/9p40p39f8b39
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011419/

Sit back on the couch and enjoy the crypts developed by the Cryptmaster as they guide you through the dungeon and reach the surface. Use your words to utilize your abilities against the monsters who have never seen the light of day and remember memories that were long forgotten about each of your adventurers. Follow the journey of the four recently risen from the dead heroes as they are guided by the proud, yet possibly maniacal Cryptmaster to the surface through swamps infested with slimes, castles overran by toadmen, friendly rats building infrastructure in the dungeon, and more. Will the heroes survive or succumb to the crypts and become just another skull on the walls?
